name: Blobble
description:
Blobble is a single player, shareware, puzzle game.

The object of the game is to guide the character around the screen moving from square to square and collecting tokens. All tokens must be collected within a time limit. If the player falls off the grid or down a hole then they lose a life and must start again.
In addition to tokens the grid also contains bonus cells that can give additional lives, time, points etc and hazard cells which contain holes, can only be traversed one way, or which are cracked and can only be used a limited number of times.

The registered version has forty levels, when a level is completed the player receives a password enabling them to resume the game at a high level next time.
